programmes.show_description: Love beauty? Tune in to see our exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to love.
Indulge yourself with pampering beauty products, including make-up, skincare and more, featuring iconic British botanical beauty brand, Liz Earle.
Bringing together the latest, ground-breaking technology with the highest grade concentration of unique active ingredients, discover long-lasting skincare with anti-ageing benefits from skinSense.
Get high performance results you want with Doll10: the pioneer in age reversal beauty and a combination of breakthrough technologies, age transforming complexes and real life make-up techniques.
Tune in to discover the best beauty buys currently available here at QVC. As we already boast one of the finest beauty ranges around, this really is the creme de la creme so don't miss out!
Love beauty? Tune in to see the latest deals and bag a beauty bargain. We've got an exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to adore.
Love beauty? Tune in to see our exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to love.
Transform your tresses with Michael Van Clarke's expert haircare. Achieve strong, vibrant, A-lister hair that shines. Say farewell to bad hair days!
Discover Wellbeing Heroes - top picks to help you feel your best every day. Explore essentials for mind, body, and soul, and boost your daily wellness routine!
Up your beauty game with our best finds in the industry, from favourite formulas to the latest releases. Whether you want to shake up your make-up or step up your skincare, find it here.
Liz Earle is an award-winning British beauty brand renowned for creating naturally active skincare and bodycare products, which help to deliver real results for all ages and skin types.
This spring, rely on our skin saviours from the experts at Elemis! World-renowned for incredible skincare, Elemis will help get the very best out of your complexion, whatever your skin type or need.
Love beauty? Tune in to see the latest deals and bag a beauty bargain. We've got an exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to adore.
Pamper your hands and feet with innovative hand and footcare formulas from international podiatrist and foot expert Margaret Dabbs.
Beauty Tools at 2pm.
Laura Geller is a renowned make-up artist, teacher and working mother and the creative force behind one of the most successful make-up studios in New York. Join us to explore her superb range.
